table.name: vtiger_purchaseorderdocument
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_purchaseorderdocument` ( `purchaseorderdocumentid` int NOT NULL, `pod_file` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pod_description` text, `pod_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`purchaseorderdocumentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3

table.name: vtiger_purchaseorderdocumentcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_purchaseorderdocumentcf` ( `purchaseorderdocumentid` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`purchaseorderdocumentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3
